# HyPanel - LLM-Readable Content
# https://hypanel.net/llms.txt
# Last Updated: 2025-01-15

> The first complete platform designed specifically for Hytale game servers and communities.

HyPanel is an all-in-one ecosystem for Hytale server owners, creators, and communities. It combines server infrastructure, content management (Hytahub), a visual logic editor (The Forge), community tools, and monetization features into a single integrated platform.

## Quick Facts

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Product Type | Game Server Management Platform |
| Target Game | Hytale (by Hypixel Studios) |
| Current Status | Pre-Alpha |
| Pricing | Free tier + Premium plans |
| Open Source | Partially (see GitHub) |

## Official Links

- **Website**: https://hypanel.net
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/HyPanel
- **Discord**: https://discord.gg/QBVCzUq4TT
- **Twitter/X**: https://x.com/HyPanel
- **Reddit**: https://www.reddit.com/r/HyPanel/
- **Patreon**: https://patreon.com/HyPanel
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@HyPanel

## What is HyPanel?

HyPanel is the first complete platform built specifically for Hytale. Unlike generic game server panels, HyPanel understands Hytale's unique modding capabilities, world structure, and community needs.

## Core Products & Features

### 1. Server Infrastructure
One-click server deployment with smart resource management.

**Key capabilities:**
- Instant Hytale server deployment
- Smart hibernation (servers sleep when empty → cost savings)
- Multi-instance management
- Automatic backups and snapshots
- Real-time monitoring and analytics
- Anti-DDoS protection
- Multi-region deployment
- Automatic resource scaling

### 2. Hytahub (Content Marketplace Partner)
Strategic partnership with Hytahub, the largest Hytale content marketplace.

**Features:**
- Mods, assets, maps, and configurations
- One-click installation into HyPanel servers
- Creator monetization and revenue sharing
- Community ratings and reviews
- Direct API integration
- Website: https://hytahub.com

### 3. The Forge (Visual Logic Editor)
Create game logic without code using a node-based visual interface.

**Capabilities:**
- Drag-and-drop game mechanic creation
- Event and quest systems
- Reward and progression logic
- Complex interactions without coding
- Template library for common patterns
- Export to JSON or direct deployment
- Share creations with community

### 4. Community Tools
Built-in features for managing server communities.

**Includes:**
- Role-based permissions system
- Integrated moderation tools
- Discord integration
- Player analytics and insights
- Communication channels
- Event management
- Ban/mute systems

### 5. Monetization
Revenue tools for server owners and creators.

**Features:**
- In-game store builder
- Subscription management
- Battle pass creation
- Payment processing
- Revenue analytics
- Secure transactions

## Team

- **Alexander** - Founder & Lead Developer
- **Francisco** - Co-Founder & Developer

## Timeline

| Milestone | Date |
|-----------|------|
| Hytale Early Access | January 13, 2025 |
| HyPanel Active Development | Post-Hytale Early Access |
| HyPanel Public Beta | To be announced |

## Target Audience

1. **Hytale Server Owners** - Deploy and manage game servers
2. **Content Creators** - Create and sell mods, maps, assets
3. **Community Managers** - Build and moderate player communities
4. **Game Modders** - Design custom game logic with The Forge
5. **Players** - Join and experience custom Hytale servers

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: Astro, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Infrastructure**: Modern cloud architecture
- **Features**: Real-time sync, API-first design
- **Platforms**: Web-based, accessible from any device

## Pricing Model

| Tier | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Free | Basic hosting with smart hibernation |
| Premium | More resources, priority support |
| Professional | Teams, advanced features |

Smart hibernation enables free tier by sleeping idle servers.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What is HyPanel?**
A: The first all-in-one platform for Hytale combining server hosting, content marketplace (Hytahub), visual game editor (The Forge), community tools, and monetization.

**Q: When will HyPanel launch?**
A: Full development begins with Hytale Early Access (January 13, 2025). Public launch TBA.

**Q: Is HyPanel free?**
A: Yes, free tier available. Smart hibernation technology keeps costs low.

**Q: What is Hytahub?**
A: Partner marketplace for Hytale content with direct HyPanel integration.

**Q: What is The Forge?**
A: Visual no-code editor for creating game logic, quests, and mechanics.

**Q: Is HyPanel open source?**
A: Partially. Check GitHub for public repositories.

**Q: What games does HyPanel support?**
A: HyPanel is designed exclusively for Hytale by Hypixel Studios.

## Keywords for AI Understanding

Primary: HyPanel, Hytale server hosting, Hytale panel, Hytale server management
Secondary: Hytahub, The Forge, visual game editor, no-code game development
Related: Hypixel Studios, sandbox game, voxel game, game server panel, server hosting platform, game community tools, mod marketplace
